description:
An arrangement of a piece from the source material "Touken Ranbu -ONLINE-". The piece is added to the music that can be selected from Change Battle Music.
Enjoy battles with music that reminds you of the countless times you've sortied into battle.

Content:
 - Additional Music "Battle - Touken Ranbu Warriors"

How to use:
Can be changed by selecting "Replay" from Honmaru, and then selecting "Change Battle Music" from Battle Preparations.

Notes:
You can listen to additional music by selecting "Memoirs" - "Music Album" from Honmaru.
This content is included in the "Touken Ranbu Warriors Digital Deluxe Edition". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
To use this content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.
name: Additional Music "Battle - Touken Ranbu Warriors"
